description:
Loaded with grilled corn, beans and rice, this spicy bowl of vegetarian goodness will get you refueled and ready to hit the trail.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: instant white rice, black beans, taco seasoning [paprika, corn meal, salt, onion, spices, garlic, tomato, citric acid, soybean oil (as a processing aid)], sweet corn, pepper jack cheese [(pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, jalapeno peppers, enzymes), powdered cellulose (added to prevent caking)], tomato flakes, bell pepper red & green combo, red onion, potato starch, sea salt, crystallized lime (citric acid, lime oil, lime juice), garlic granulated, black pepper, natural flavor [contains baker’s yeast extract, salt, canola oil (anti-dusting)],cilantro, jalapeno
  • Allergens: contains milk
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Mexican Style Veggie Bowl
